text.headline: Brambles - A New Golf Course in California
text.text:
In California's wine country lies Brambles, designed by Bill Coore and Ben Crenshaw. James Duncan was the onsite design lead. The Mediterranean climate influences the course maintenance meld. Dry summers and mild winters shape its presentation. Coore Crenshaw are renowned for his minimalist designs highlighting the natural landscape.

The property features a narrow waterway similar to the Swilcan Burn. There is an airport runway onsite.
